items.title: MULTIMODAL MEMORY ENHANCEMENT
items.description: Research-backed visual augmentation combined with auditory theta entrainment (4-8 Hz) for superior memory encoding

items.title: THETA STATE OPTIMIZATION
items.description: 47% increase in theta power demonstrated through EEG studies (η²=.304) using synchronized binaural beats and visual flicker

items.title: EVIDENCE-BASED LEARNING
items.description: Published research showing 21% improved recall (M=38.2 vs 31.5) with persistent 7-day retention advantages
